author: Retro Game Corps
description:
The AYN Thor is a beautiful successor to the 3DS line of handhelds, but with a ton more power and possibilities.  It's not perfect, but in this video we'll explore all the reasons why this is a hall-of-fame handheld.

Buy one here: https://tinyurl.com/ThorRGC
Impressions video: https://youtu.be/B2sUrakqWt0
Microfiber cloths: https://amzn.to/3KVJK37

Emulators tested:
Azahar: https://github.com/azahar-emu/azahar/releases
MelonDS fork: https://github.com/SapphireRhodonite/melonDS-android/releases
Cemu fork: https://github.com/SapphireRhodonite/Cemu/releases

Android handheld starter guide: https://youtu.be/I4mqgcDYZFo
Stylus testing video: https://youtu.be/BoYp30Meki0
Steam games on Android: https://youtu.be/uPhMDCA2iEA

This was a review unit sent to me by the manufacturer.  All opinions are my own, they did not see this review ahead of time, and no money was exchanged in any way.

Ways to support this channel:
RGC merch: https://store.retrogamecorps.com
Stickers and magnets: https://w
title: AYN Thor In-Depth Review
